slide.title: Assignment: Installation
slide.subtitle: ~10 minutes
slide.example: pear config-set php_dir /home/ezc/pear pear config-set data_dir /home/ezc/pear-data pear config-set test_dir /home/ezc/pear-test pear config-set doc_dir /home/ezc/pear-doc pear config-set preferred_state alpha
slide.blurb: Install the components with the PEAR installer.
Create the script "%~/include/ezc-setup.php%" that sets up the components' autoloading mechanism. Set the include path to "%/home/ezc/pear:/home/ezc:.%".
